question: Which river divides the city of Toruń, Poland into two parts?
asked_question_translated: Welcher Fluss teilt die Stadt Toruń, Polen, in zwei Teile?
answer: Die Stadt Toruń in Polen wird vom Fluss Weichsel (Wisła) in zwei Teile geteilt.
answer_translated_eng: The city of Toruń in Poland is divided into two parts by the Vistula River (Wisła).
